articles.title: Best face masks to wear: Doctors share their favorite masks - NBC News
articles.description: Shop the best masks to wear for comfort and breathability, according to doctors. Healthcare professionals share their favorite face masks to wear while off-duty.
articles.content: Medical professionals in high-risk environments regularly wear N95 and KN95 masks while at work, according to the CDC. Although those types of masks are available to shop online, theyre hard to come … [+6848 chars]
